COMMAND.NAME: setsyntaxmap
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Set the syntax map in use for the given buffer. If an empty map string is specified, then remove any map from the current buffer
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
